title: PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1
long_description: PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1 is a specialized product that improves water quality and leaves water crystal clear in pools with a salt chlorine generator. When used in conjunction with PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1, it will increase the efficiency of salt chlorine generators, protect cells, delay corrosion and improve swimmer comfort with just once a month application.
short_description: BENEFITS Increases the efficiency of salt chlorine generators and delays corrosion Softens water to improve swimmer comfort FORMAT Pouch of 454 g

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle the required amount of PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1 PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1 into the pool in front of the water return outlet.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Check the water’s pH after adding PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1 and adjust to between 7.2 and 7.8 if necessary. PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1 must be used monthly. Wait 30 minutes before using the pool.

dosage.specifications: Add one 454 g pouch of PROTECT CELL ULTRA 2 IN 1 per 25,000 L of pool water once a month in a single application.

warning: DO NOT apply the product directly in the skimmer basket. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
